Frequently asked questions

Straight answers about privacy, control, and how work moves through Zartman.io from RFQ to award.

Who sees my CAD files and RFQs?
We only share your RFQs and files with suppliers we've matched to your project. No public job boards or blast lists.
Do I have to award every RFQ?
No. Compare quotes and move forward only when you're comfortable with price, lead time, and supplier fit.
What if a supplier ghosts or misses a date?
We monitor activity in your workspace and can reroute jobs or bring in another supplier if something goes sideways.
How do suppliers get paid?
Once you award a winner, you pay your supplier directly based on the terms you agree to together.
